page.title: 15A DAY IN MY LIFE PT 1
page.content: When I get up in the morning which is between half past six and seven o'clock,I get dressed in my old clothes and go outside to help milk the cows.At a quarter to eight I go into the house and have a wash and get ready for school,then I have my breakfast,which is usually cornflakes and milk.I then have another wash and put my coat on and wait for the school taxi to pick me up.When the taxi comes I get on and it takes me to school.When I get to school I put myt coat on my peg and put any other things in my desk. At nine o'clock Mr.Yeomans calls the register and then we go into the hall for assembly.After assembly we go back into the classroom and do maths until half past ten, then it is playtime until ten forty-five.We then do work from our Sound Sense English books.
